医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
INTEGRA Biosciences 的移液器有助于农业的成功位于罗马尼亚 Fundulea 的国家农业研究与发展研究所 (NARDI) 依靠 INTEGRA Biosciences 的电子多通道移液器来简化其液体处理工作流程。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240709/INTEGRA-Biosciencese28099-pipettes-help-to-cultivate-success-in-agriculture.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240709/INTEGRA-Biosciencese28099-pipettes-help-to-cultivate-success-in-agriculture.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=823fafbb-51a4-47a5-9d2a-5f86978d5b34 Tue, 09 Jul 2024 03:13:00 -0400 INTEGRA Biosciences’ pipettes help to cultivate success in agriculture
革命性的 3D 成像模型增强 IVF 囊胚选择今天在阿姆斯特丹举行的 ESHRE 第 40 届年会上发布的创新研究推出了一种新颖的 3D 成像模型，旨在识别与成功妊娠相关的囊胚（植入胚胎发育的早期阶段）的特征。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240708/Revolutionary-3D-imaging-model-enhances-IVF-blastocyst-selection.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240708/Revolutionary-3D-imaging-model-enhances-IVF-blastocyst-selection.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5984a360-e96c-4b3c-adc2-82dd45e89748 Mon, 08 Jul 2024 23:41:00 -0400 Revolutionary 3D imaging model enhances IVF blastocyst selection
研究揭示了 ART 治疗后实现活产的社会差异今天在阿姆斯特丹举行的 ESHRE 第 40 届年会上发表的一项新颖研究揭示了辅助生殖技术 (ART) 治疗后实现活产的巨大社会差异。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240708/Study-reveals-social-disparities-in-achiving-live-births-following-ART-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240708/Study-reveals-social-disparities-in-achieving-live-births-following-ART-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d884dcb5-4df7-496c-b015-a7736b87e7a6 Mon, 08 Jul 2024 23:21:15 -0400 Study reveals social disparities in achieving live births following ART treatment
联合使用流行的糖尿病药物可能会提供额外的预防心脏和肾脏疾病的保护新研究表明，联合使用钠葡萄糖协同转运蛋白 2 抑制剂 (SGLT2is) 和胰高血糖素样肽 1 受体激动剂 (GLP1-RA) 可能会为糖尿病患者提供额外的预防心脏和肾脏疾病的保护。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240708/Combined-use-of-popular-diabetes-drugs-likely-to-offer-additional-protection-against-heart-and-kidney-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240708/Combined-use-of-popular-diabetes-drugs-likely-to-offer-additional-protection-against-heart-and-kidney-disease.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=200ad368-397e-4c0c-a636-0125b41607c2 Mon, 08 Jul 2024 23:16:35 -0400 Combined use of popular diabetes drugs likely to offer additional protection against heart and kidney disease
AI模型可以通过胸片高精度评估肺功能如果说世界上每个人都做过一项体检，那就是胸部 X 光检查。临床医生可以使用射线照片来判断某人是否患有肺结核、肺癌或其他疾病，但他们不能用它们来判断肺部功能是否良好。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240708/AI-model-can-estimate-lung-function-from-chest-radiographs-with-high-accuracy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240708/AI-model-can-estimate-lung-function-from-chest-radiographs-with-high-accuracy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=57f89194-6e9c-4f27-8ce0-78e9793e9cf6 Mon, 08 Jul 2024 23:09:27 -0400 AI model can estimate lung function from chest radiographs with high accuracy
新研究显示索马鲁肽与严重眼部疾病 NAION 的风险增加有关研究表明，与其他治疗糖尿病和肥胖症药物的使用者相比，索马鲁肽使用者患非动脉炎性前部缺血性视神经病变（NAION）的风险显着更高。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240708/Semaglutide-linked-to-increased-risk-of-severe-eye-condition-NAION-in-new-study.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240708/Semaglutide-linked-to-increased-risk-of-severe-eye-condition-NAION-in-new-study.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bd835f66-c630-4702-8220-d86228ea2571 Mon, 08 Jul 2024 23:05:00 -0400 Semaglutide linked to increased risk of severe eye condition NAION in new study
基于智能手机的行为疗法可改善纤维肌痛患者的病情由辛辛那提大学和 Swing Therapeutics 领导的新研究发现，基于智能手机的自我引导行为疗法可以显着改善纤维肌痛患者的病情。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240708/Smartphone-based-behavioral-therapy-leads-to-improvements-for-病人-with-纤维肌痛.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240708/Smartphone-based-behavioral-therapy-leads-to-improvements-for-病人-with-纤维肌痛.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=69ce2d72-974b-4ed3-ab15-3af2cc4f9647 Mon, 08 Jul 2024 22:59:09 -0400 Smartphone-based behavioral therapy leads to improvements for patients with fibromyalgia
当 T 细胞几乎不表达 ACE-2 受体时，SARS-CoV-2 如何导致淋巴细胞减少？研究人员揭示了 SARS-CoV-2 诱导淋巴细胞减少症的直接和间接机制，强调了 CD147 的作用以及病毒进入 T 细胞的替代途径。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240708/How-does-SARS-CoV-2-cause-lymphopenia-when-T-cells-barely-express-ACE-2-receptors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240708/How-does-SARS-CoV-2-cause-lymphopenia-when-T-cells-barely-express-ACE-2-receptors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f021d524-ff71-4700-b991-eb0fa40145fe Mon, 08 Jul 2024 22:48:00 -0400 How does SARS-CoV-2 cause lymphopenia when T cells barely express ACE-2 receptors?
研究发现心脏骤停后女性面临更高的心理健康挑战欧洲每年约有 35 万人因心脏骤停而受影响，其中不到 20% 在院外心脏骤停后幸存。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240708/Women-face-higher-mental-health-challenges-after-cardiac-arrest-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240708/Women-face-higher-mental-health-challenges-after-cardiac-arrest-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8abe6b22-8146-4b30-abec-78c0e67d008f Mon, 08 Jul 2024 22:45:58 -0400 Women face higher mental health challenges after cardiac arrest, study finds
GLP-1 药物被发现可降低糖尿病患者患癌症的风险研究发现，与胰岛素相比，GLP-1 受体激动剂可显着降低 2 型糖尿病患者患 13 种与肥胖相关的癌症中的 10 种的风险，但与二甲双胍相比，效果不同。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240708/GLP-1-drugs-found-to-lower-cancer-risk-in-diabetes-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240708/GLP-1-drugs-found-to-lower-cancer-risk-in-diabetes-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1e32e0b8-cb9b-4b0e-aa1a-dc37d0d7d129 Mon, 08 Jul 2024 22:22:00 -0400 GLP-1 drugs found to lower cancer risk in diabetes patients
